item.description:
Hey there!

We are proud to announce our 3rd Annual Open Mic Halloween Party!  This event has been a huge success in the past and we are really excited for it.  We encourage all attendees to come in costume and we will be having a costume contest, raffles and prizes (oh and plenty of great music!). We look forward to seeing you all there!

 

Thanks, 

Peter and Rhiannon

 

If you haven't found us on facebook yet, feel free to like our page and browse through photos from all of our past events!  Our average audience ranges from 60-120 or so music lovers and musicians.  This is a family friendly event and is monitored as such.

 

www.facebook.com/localmusiccommunity
item.name: Open Mic Halloween Party
